body:
`GetHistoryTask` is not used anywhere, shall we remove it from the codebase? 

Or we plan to build some admin api around it?

comments.body:
Will remove this API.

The only use case I can see is use it as an admin tool to dump information for a certain task, which GetHistoryTasks  (the batch read version) can also do.

The only case batch read can’t cover is when there’re multiple tasks with same visibility timestamp (1ms precision) in a scheduled queue, all tasks with that timestamp will be returned. But I don’t think for a given shard there’ll be tons of tasks with the same timestamp so that should be ok.

title: Unused `GetHistoryTask` persistence API
